subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Coburn, an owner of California Chrome, said horses shouldn’t be allowed to skip the Kentucky Derby to stay fresh for the Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Coburn, an owner of California Chrome, said horses shouldn’t be allowed to skip the Kentucky Derby to stay fresh for the Belmont Stakes.
